attributes.action: Make the use of off shore tax havens an offence of tax evasion.
attributes.additional_details: Has anything happened after the Panama papers came out? No. This is the solution.
attributes.background:
Billions of British pounds owned by UK citizens,  residents  and companies stored off shore to avoid paying tax to the UK government. As well as being 
imoral this practice causes great harm to the UK economy and must stop immediately.
